item.description: Theater at:Silver Center For The Arts (Silver.Plymouth.edu,603-535-2787): Take I93 north to exit 26,make right at bottom of the ramp onto Holderness Road (NH175A),cross river,go three-quarters around the traffic circle onto Main Street (US3),go one block,make right onto Court Street,make right into parking lot that says faculty parking.Come early to get parking spot and theater ticket.A play created as a response to former Harvard President Lawrence Summers' now infamous suggestion that women are less represented than men in the sciences because of "innate gender differences".$8.The College does high quality plays,concerts,dance performances,I have been going there for years.Steve
item.name: PLAY--TRUTH VALUES,one girl's romp through MIT's male math maze
